on reading compounds: 鞠躬如【キッキュウジョ】deferential, humble, reverent, respectful
鞠問【キクモン】examination, interrogation, questioning
推鞠【スイキク】investigating (e.g. a criminal)
蹴鞠【ケマリ】kemari, type of football played by courtiers in ancient Japan
